info.title: OpenAPI Specification
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Specify the amount of records returned, default is 25

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify the page

user_id.description: Specify the user_id here if there is one. Calls to this endpoint without a user_id will                          create an order with a nil user

order_token.description: Spree will look for an order with the order token if it is provided. If an order with                              the specified token is not found, Spree will create a new order with an autogenerated                              guest token that should be stored in cookies and returned with subsequent calls. The                              order token can be passed as a parameter or a header. If passed as both a header and                              parameter, the header will take precedence.

quantity.description: Specify the quantity requested, must be greater than 0

vendor_id.description: Specify the vendor id, from the price chosen

gift_card_details_attributes.description: Line item gift card details attributes

200.description: Add a gift card item to a cart

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Specify the order number

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: order number

parameters.name: order_number
parameters.description: order number

parameters.name: user_id_eq
parameters.description: Anything accessible by ransack can be passed in as query params

name.description: The first wishlist created is given the name "My Wishlist".               Subsequent wishlists must be given a new name.

user_id.description: User ID must match that of the current_api_user unless the current_api_user is an admin.               User ID will be inferred from the current_api_user unless explicitly provided

is_default.description: The first wishlist created will automatically be set to default. Subsequent lists will have is_default               set to false. If you pass is_default true it will set all other user wishlists to is_default: false.

wished_products_attributes.description: You can create a new wishlist with wished products in one step by passing them as nested attributes.               This should be an array of objects.

variant_id.description: Pass the variant id for a wished product as a nested attribute.

quantity.description: Pass the quantity for a wished product as a nested attribute

remark.description: Pass the remark for the specific wished product as a nested attribute.

status.description: Default status is 'subscribed', the other available statuses are 'unsubscribed',                          'subscribed_and_synced', 'unsubscribed_and_synced'

options.description: Hash containing the vendor_id. It's used to set the price based on vendor

quantity.description: default value when not provided is 1

restart_checkout.description: Whether the checkout should restart from the beginning (must be set for express checkouts)

wishlist_id.description: Optional. If the wishlist_id is not provided, the product will be created for the spree_api_user's               default wishlist. Admin users can pass another user's wishlist_id

parameters.name: without_children
parameters.description: Use this parameter to disable returning descendant taxons

parameters.name: purchasable_boutiques
parameters.description: Use this parameter to only return boutiques with purchasable products

parameters.name: purchasable_brands
parameters.description: Use this parameter to only return brands with purchasable products

parameters.description: Optional parameter to filter by taxonomy name

parameters.name: name_eq
parameters.description: Use this parameter to query taxons by name

parameters.name: permalink_eq
parameters.description: Use this parameter to query taxons by permalink

tags.name: Orders
tags.description: Return an order, scoped to the current user

tags.name: Wishlists
tags.description: Get all wishlists, only accessible to admin users

tags.name: Subscribers
tags.description: Update a subscriber. Users can update their own subscriber, admins can update minis for others.

tags.name: Stock Requests
tags.description: Create a new stock request, accessible without an api key

tags.name: LineItem
tags.description: Representation of a single cart item for a specific variant with price of vendor

tags.name: Braintree transactions
tags.description: Please do not send billing address attributes at all if there is no billing address, otherwise you will get an order error

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Subscribe a user. If the user does not already have an associated subscriber, this will create one.                 If the user is already in a subscribed state, this will not change any records

tags.name: Minis
tags.description: Update a mini. Users can update their own minis, admins can update minis for others.

tags.name: Wished Products
tags.description: Create a wished product. Any user can create a wished product for one of their own wishlists.                 Admins can create wished products for others.

tags.name: Passwords
tags.description: Validate user email and password. Does not handle any session and only return the user

tags.name: Return Authorizations
tags.description: Get a single user return authorziation

tags.name: Store Credits API
tags.description: Get user store_credits and current account balance for the current user

tags.name: Recently Viewed Products
tags.description: Store a recently viewed variant by user_id or session_id
